name: The Whiskered Wizard
description:
MY CATS HAVE RAN AWAY??!?

You  must go look for your precious cats deep within the dungeon. Play through several levels where you conjure up special shapes that will help you get through the puzzles and save your scared cats !  

PLEASE PLAY IN FULL SCREEN MODE TO SEE EVERYTHING, THANKS ! 

still in development ! ~

HOW TO PLAY 

WASD to move 

SPACE to jump

Left Click to use spell

Right Click to remove objects

Z, X, C to use box, triangle, and ball spell respectively

CREDITS 

Developed by : Michelle Vu and Julia Andrejczuk 

Music by : N-JUYK1
